name: Roll of the Die (ContentatoGames)
description:
Click on a card and hope it gives you money, health, happiness, or smarts. It probably won't. And all those things can do is help you live longer than everyone else. You're going to die eventually.

Enjoy!

Made with Android Studio in Java with libGDX. Graphics all produced by Contentato Video Games LLC. Sound assets all covered by the Creative Commons license.
